description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Chicago 2016
http://gotochgo.com

Jessica Kerr - Polyglot Functional Developer

ABSTRACT
What do you get when you combine strict functional programming with heavy user interaction? Challenges, and unexpected freedoms. Elm is a purely functional language for the browser. It compiles to JavaScript -- after enforcing immutability, types, semantic versioning, and tight [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
http://gotocon.com/chicago-2016/presentation/Adventures%20in%20Elm

title: GOTO 2016 • Adventures in Elm • Jessica Kerr
